headline: CIBC Remains Neutral on Waste Management (WM) Amid Focus on Growth Following Stericycle Acquisition
summary: Representing 15.44% of Bill Gates’s stock portfolio, Waste Management, Inc. (NYSE:WM) is one of his top 15 stock picks. On October 29, 2025, The Fly reported that CIBC reduced its price target on Waste Management, Inc. (NYSE:WM) from $235 to $231, while keeping a “Neutral” rating. While pointing toward the company’s Q3 2025 results, the investment firm […]
